We're watching these U.S. actions with great concern." Ukrainians have been saying in recent days they're hoping for the best but preparing for the worst. The diplomacy is at least still in play. sentences.sentence: In the unlikely setting of a Washington gift shop, US President Joe Biden has issued his latest warnings to Russia over Ukraine, including the threat of personal sanctions against Vladimir Putin himself in the event of an invasion.

Opinion polls suggest that only about a quarter of Americans have confidence in Biden to effectively manage the military or promote US standing in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Today's nomad-informed talks between senior advisers from Ukraine, Russia, Germany and France in Paris surely give hope for a peaceful solution to the Ukraine crisis. The goal of this format is to end the conflict in the east of Ukraine, but the talks have been stalled because of the differences on how to press ahead. After a visit of senior German and French diplomats to Russia at the beginning of this month, the Normandy format seems to have been revived. The agenda was not made public, but the Minsk agreements will no doubt be one of the topics of discussion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russia has been accusing Ukraine of sabotaging those agreements, underlining that one of the crucial points is the special status of the separatist regions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.sentence: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus is set to get a second five-year term in office as Director-General of the World Health Organization after no candidates were put forward to challenge him at a meeting of the agency's executive board. The deciding vote at the WHO's Assembly in May is now expected to be a formality.

sentences.sentence: Denmark footballer Christian Eriksson has returned to training with Ajax's reserve team seven months after suffering a cardiac arrest at the European Championships.
